description:
Mark Smith

Don't be afraid of metaclasses! This talk will explain how, once you've grasped basic types, classes and inheritance, Python's advanced language features such as descriptors and metaclasses are just within your reach.

https://2019.pycon-au.org/talks/its-pythons-all-the-way-down-python-types-metaclasses-made-simple

PyCon AU, the national Python Language conference, is on again this August in Sydney, at the International Convention Centre, Sydney, August 24 - 28 2018.

Video licence: CC BY-NC-SA 4.0 - https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/

Python, PyCon, PyConAU

Sat Aug  3 10:30:00 2019 at C3.6
title: It's Pythons All The Way Down: Python Types & Metaclasses Made Simple
